channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Vance vows Trump administration will be 'biggest defenders of religious liberties,' Catholics
item.description: Vice President JD Vance promised the Trump administration would advocate for Christians and serve as the “biggest defenders of religious liberties."

item.title: Iran Tried To Put A Bullet In My Head Because I Support The West’s Pressure Against The Regime
item.description: Trump has correctly adopted a maximum pressure policy. The United Kingdom, the European Union, and its member states should follow suit.

item.title: Education Department Launches ‘End DEI’ Whistleblower Portal
item.description: The po.rtal comes after the Education Department has been quick to launch investigations into potentially discriminatory school districts

item.title: Canada Gives Up Trying to Prove the Mass Graves Hoax
item.description: We welcome the abandonment of this lie. We regret that it comes so late and without apologies.

item.title: 'Great job' or 'no idea what he's doing'? Elon Musk email sets Capitol Hill ablaze
item.description: Democrats are fighting mad about Elon Musk’s email to federal workers asking them to name five things they accomplished in a week, saying the DOGE chi...

item.title: Backlash to 'green' agenda fueled by high energy costs
item.description: Steep increases in energy bills are leading consumers in blue states to question renewable energy policies that have failed to deliver more reliable, ...

item.title: Volunteers use bullhorns and sirens to warn immigrants when ICE is in their area
item.description: Just before dawn, 10 people met at a parking lot shared by a laundromat and coffee shop in South Central Los Angeles on what has become a daily missio...

item.title: DOGE May Force Bureaucrats To Think Twice Before Spending Your Tax Dollars
item.description: This idea that the taxpayers now can and will have oversight of federal bureaucracies has been unleashed.

item.title: Trump to sign order making English the official language
item.description: President Trump is planning to sign an executive order Friday making English the official language of the U.S.

item.title: In Landmark Court Decision, Latin America Protects National Pro-Life Laws
item.description: The United States rejected national pro-abortion extremism with Dobbs, and Latin America followed close behind with a landmark ruling.

item.title: AMLO, Claudia, Mexico
item.description: In Mexico, the populist Left is in charge, with two (contrasting) personalities at the top.

item.title: Direct File Is a Prime Example of IRS Waste. President Trump Should Eliminate It
item.description: Direct File should be eliminated swiftly, and Democrats should spare us the hypocritical whining about unelected auditors.

item.title: Blue state workers rally around top Trump official targeting congestion pricing: 'Borderline stealing'
item.description: New York City workers slammed the city’s congestion traffic pricing in a new ad from the Department of Transportation.

item.title: Rep. Jeffries warns Americans will be ‘devastated’ after House Republicans advance ‘largest Medicaid cut'
item.description: House Minority Leader Jeffries is warning Americans will be "devastated" by what he calls the "largest Medicaid cut in American history" being pushed ...

item.title: Adoption Is The Pro-Life Antidote To The IVF Onslaught

item.title: The Week: The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly of Trump’s Ukraine Push
item.description: Plus: House Republicans pass a too-modest budget resolution.

item.title: ICE makes major move on detaining illegal immigrants in heart of blue state
item.description: The Trump administration is expanding immigration detention in a Democratic-run state as it seeks to expand the number of beds it has at its disposal.

item.title: Trump's early backing of Ramaswamy for Ohio governor seen by some as meant to avoid a nasty primary

item.title: Catholic Vice President J.D. Vance acknowledges Pope Francis' criticism of immigration crackdown
item.description: Vice President J.D. Vance acknowledged Pope Francis' criticism of the Trump administration's crackdown on immigration, without responding to any of it...

item.title: Don’t Let Appeasement History Repeat in Ukraine
item.description: Steve Witkoff’s rehash of past deals that created the current crisis isn’t a good model for Trump to follow if he desires a legacy of peace.
